alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:32PM CDT until July 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN AND CENTRAL GREENWOOD COUNTY... At 631 PM CDT, strong to severe thunderstorms were located 6 miles west of Hamilton to 8 miles northwest of Toronto, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Virgil, Eureka City Lake, Eureka Airport and Thrall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
